mapper.update:
update project_info
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update project_info set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT pi.id, pi.code, pi.title, pi.status, pi.group_id userGroup, ui.name userName, pi.create_time createDateTime, pi.describe FROM project_info pi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON pi.create_user_id = ui.id WHERE pi.id=#{projectID}
